Service Details: - Provides young people, including pregnant or parenting youth, with self-contained accommodation that offers a realistic living experience- Each suite has a mentor on-site for support and young people are assisted to gain or enhance life management skills with the assistance of the mentor and a Youth Transitions counsellor- Life management skills include financial management, household maintenance, menu planning and food preparation
How to Apply: The Transition Suites are considered part of the foster home support network under the direct supervision of the Resources Unit of Ministry of Children and Family Development.Transition Suite Mentors maintain a collaborative working relationship with The Bridge Youth & Family Services and the Ministry of Children and Family Development. Mentors provide a high standard of service for the youth residing within the Transition Suite, through ongoing training and skill development opportunities, and with continued support from the Youth Transitions counsellors and Transition Suite facilitator.For additional information, please call or email.
Address & Map: 2604 Enterprise Way, #8Kelowna, BC     V1X 7Y5View MapQuest Map
